title: How should I write an application letter asking for a teaching in a school? - Quora

response.answer_text: For a teaching… I imagine you are meaning : For a scholastic course to learn ? You start with either: Dear Sir or Madame Or To whome it may concern. My name is…… give Your age… I am ( your nationality) and I live….plus any other details or information you can give regarding your schooling. What school you attended, how many years. what grade you reached. Followed by I would like to… or, I am interested in…applying for a scholastic or learning course in the English language… (or whatever the subject is that you are looking to study.) Could you please assist me. I look forward to hearing back from you Yours sincerely Sign your name Don't forget to put the date at the top when you wrote the letter.
